steps.content: As two fire signs, Sagittarius and Aries are overall a perfect match. Passionate and driven, this couple will push each other to reach their goals and be the best version of themselves. They’re each optimistic in their own way, so they’ll have no trouble looking on the bright side of things. They’ll bond over their shared love of adventure and their thirst for knowledge. steps.title: Both passionate lovers, this pair sets off fireworks in the bedroom.
steps.content: Both passionate lovers, this pair sets off fireworks in the bedroom. Sagittarius is known for being a very sexual sign, and Aries isn’t shy about telling their lover what they want. This couple will always be open to trying new things, and neither will judge or laugh at the other person for suggesting something. Just like their personalities outside the bedroom, their natural similarities make them the perfect match in bed. [2] X Research source Aries tends to be a little more serious about sex, while Sagittarius loves to laugh during the act. The two can find a middle ground that makes them both feel comfortable to have an awesome time.

steps.title: Aries is direct with their emotions, while Sagittarius is more subtle.
steps.content: Aries is direct with their emotions, while Sagittarius is more subtle. Aries is never afraid to speak their mind, even when it comes to uncomfortable emotions that might be hard to talk about. On the flip side, Sagittarius tends to hold their feelings in, which can make it hard for the pair to connect. However, as Sagittarius gets more comfortable, they’ll be able to open up and talk with their partner about their feelings. Sagittarius tends to need space from their partner to collect their thoughts. If the Aries can respect that, the two can come together and bond over their feelings in no time.

steps.title: Both signs value honesty, so neither will try to deceive the other.
steps.content: Both signs value honesty, so neither will try to deceive the other. Sagittarius and Aries are both great at spotting liars, so they both know that trying to lie will be futile. When these two signs get close to each other, they form a very close bond that’s hard to break. They’ll trust each other almost immediately, and they’ll love that neither one of them judges the other. [3] X Research source The only problems about trust that may arise is if the two don’t clearly define the terms of their relationship . Sagittariuses are used to short-term flings, while Aries prefers long-term romances. The two need to make sure they’re on the same page so neither one gets their feelings hurt.

steps.title: This pair will never run out of things to talk about.
steps.content: This pair will never run out of things to talk about. Sagittarius is ruled by planet Jupiter, the planet of knowledge and exploration. Similarly, Aries is ruled by Mars, the warrior planet, meaning they aren’t likely to back down about topics that are important to them. You can often find this couple engaged in a lively debate that ends with both of them expressing their opinion. Sagittarius is a mutable sign and open to change, while Aries is a cardinal sign, meaning they’re a little more set in their ways. The couple needs to be careful to respect each other’s opinions during debates and not take their words too seriously.

steps.title: These two signs have the potential for a loving, lasting relationship.
steps.content: These two signs have the potential for a loving, lasting relationship. Their similarities highly outnumber their differences, and the few differences they do have aren’t large enough to break them apart. If Aries can give Sagittarius time to open up emotionally, the two are sure to have a fun time living life together. Even if the two don’t work out romantically, there’s a chance they could stay very good friends. Their intelligence and communication styles are so similar that they could make great partners, but they could also be great BFFs.
